summary: Female Breton Companion-Combat Barbarian class, essential follower who has 3 spells at her disposal as well as some good perks. She will equip your armor, level with you and has no level cap. Located in Riften\'s Bee and Barb, awaiting your orders!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tD6zBX1.gif[/IMG]

Jeanele Maurard is the only Daughter of \'Keeper Carcette\', Keeper of the Vigil in Skyrim.
She was born before the great War with the Vampires, who destroyed the Hall of the Vigilant, home of Jeanele.
During the battle, Carcette was killed, along with most of the Defenders. 
Jeanele survived, taken to safety by Carcette\'s house servant and brought to Riften.
Here she was raised with much love and training in the arts of combat and spell-casting.
Jeanele is now residing in the Bee and Barb, Riften, where she awaits a courageous traveller who she can side with, in her quest to exact revenge upon the Vampire clans.
Will you go to Riften, to seek a companion as gifted and as loyal as Jeanele?

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oCiQEY2.gif[/IMG]

Jeanele is a Combat Barbarian with the following skills:

Spells:
Conjure Familiar
Fast Healing
Oakflesh

Perks:
Resto Apprentice
Conjure Apprentice
Alteration Apprentice
Barbarian @ 60
Champion\'s Stance
Deep Wounds
Limbsplitter
Skullcrusher

She is set to Essential, armed with a Enchanted Steel Greatsword Fire, a starter armor of Ironset, no helmet, a torch for night exteriors(unless in combat) and her default outfit are wench clothes(trade armor with her to get her to wear what she\'s given).
She will level with you and she has no level cap.
Her speed has been increased to keep up with you, and her factions updated so she doesn\'t inadvertently get in trouble at Riften :)
She can be found at Riften\'s Bee and Barb, minding her own business, awaiting some travellers\' invite to adventuring.
She is marriage material.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Gry2Io8.gif[/IMG]

Download with NMM and install.

To uninstall, use NMM.

Questions? Comments? Constructive Feedback?
Fire away.
No bugs that i have encountered.

No DLC required.
Recommended mods to use but not necessary:
Cloaks of Skyrim
Immersive Armors
High Quality Eyes

This mod is freeware, not for commercial use.
If you want to use my character, or any part of her in your work, no problem, just credit me. Only fair:)
Otherwise, use as per normal.

Credits:
hothtrooper44\'s Immersive Armors
Nikinoodles\' Cloaks of Skyrim
Xenius\' High Quality Eyes
Bethesda
Nexus
Nexus community and modders alike.
author: heeresman1
